mapper.sql: id, coin, money, status, uid, create_time AS createTime, oper_mark AS operMark, oper_id AS operId, operate_time AS operateTime, zhifubao, zhifubao_name AS zhifubaoName
mapper.select: SELECT tixian.create_time as createtime, tixian.uid as userid, info.nick_name as nickname, tixian.zhifubao as account, tixian.zhifubao_name as accountname, tixian.coin as money, tixian.id as applicationid, tixian.status as checkstatus FROM user_tixian tixian LEFT JOIN user_info info ON tixian.uid = info.id WHERE tixian.status = #{status} ORDER BY tixian.uid
mapper.update: UPDATE user_identity uidentity, user_tixian tixian SET uidentity.coin = uidentity.coin - tixian.coin AND tixian.`status` = 2 WHERE uidentity.uid = tixian.uid AND tixian.id = #{id}
